plugin_manifest.name: ARLearn Data Collection Tasks
plugin_manifest.author: Michelle Bachler. Kmi, The Open University
plugin_manifest.description: ARLearn Data Collection Tasks plugin for using the ARLearn mobile services to create data collection tasks and view the results. This plugin was build from the Tasks plugin 2.0 created by Fx Nion (http://community.elgg.org/plugins/385043/2.0/tasks-plugin)
